creator: Ceries Solutions
descriptionHtml:
Stopwatch by Ceries Solution – Measures your Time Accurately

In the digital era, where every millisecond matters, having a digital stopwatch to measure your time interval becomes necessary. In a seven billion-plus people world, the only person won the race who accurately measures his time.

It doesn't matter in which situation you are in (like sports, cooking, games, etc.), Ceries Solution Stopwatch will help you gauge up the time of any case. This stopwatch application has a simple and easy to use design with a digital time meter.

This Hybrid stopwatch application for android comes with the most useful features that will assist the user in every working scenario. To know how to use this timer stopwatch, check the content below;

Working of Cries Digital Stopwatch

Stopwatch (Digital Meter) mode:
To start measuring the time, you have to click on the start/play button located just behind the meter's left side. Afterwards, you can watch the elapsed time on the top digital display.
Once you finished the task, you can stop/pause the timer and note your work period, even in milliseconds.

Laps List:
Using Ceries Stopwatch, you can measure your time in unlimited laps. You can record your laps by just pressing the "Plus" button on the screen's right side.
Moreover,
You can easily access the lap list by just sliding your finger on the screen. On this lap list, you can see the lap numbers with total time spent on each lap. 
Ceries provides an additional feature where you can record lap and stopwatch time at the same moment.
For this, you have to click the left menu bar > go to settings > Enable Lap on Stop.  

Timer Reset Option:
Once you finished using a stopwatch, you can easily reset it to zero by clicking the button between start and laps.

Lock Screen Feature:
This feature is designed to use in every situation; while running, cooking, or paying attention to any work, you can lock the stopwatch screen by tapping on the button positioned above the timer display.

Design:
Cries Solution designed this app to make you feel that you're holding a real stopwatch timer in your hands, with stunning background colors and vibrancy.
There are two modes to choose from, Light and Dark one. You can access these modes by pressing the select mode button on the screen's top right corner.

History:
Achieving your time goals is not a one-day task. 
For that purpose, Crises stopwatch recodes elapsed time that helps the user to watch daily progress by comparing it with history.
You can access this option in the sidebar menu.

FEATURES RESUME:
 
 - Stopwatch modes.
 - Digital display.
 - Infinite laps count. 
 - Stopwatch runs in background (Lock screen option).
 - Light/Dark Mode.
 - Customizable Start Sound option.
 - Customizable Button Sound option.
 - Timer Reset Option.
- Uncomplicated Display.
 - History Record Option.

At the End

Ceries Solution always aims to give the best to the user. However, if you still found any bug feel free to contact us.
Your feedback and suggestions are highly appreciated. Thanks!

Feel free to use Cries Stopwatch | No Permissions Are Requested

title: StopWatch
